alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Lincoln; McCook; Minnehaha; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 2:27AM MDT until May 29 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 326 AM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located over Parker southwest toward Mayfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chancellor and Monroe around 330 AM CDT. Canistota around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, Wall Lake, Humboldt, Montrose, Ellis, Hartford, Sioux Falls, Crooks and Lyons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hutchinson; Lincoln; McCook; Minnehaha; Turner; Yankton
